notes: Only one SFX on a channel can be played at once!
This method looks up the SFX from the SFXS table, and if the table or the SFX was invalid it would fail!

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the SFX as displayed in the SFX Editor.

arguments.name: channel
arguments.description: The ID of the channel to play the SFX on [0-4].
